reviews.title: The Perfect Hotel for a Wonderful Break
reviews.text: Beautifully designed small boutique hotel, close to the heart of everything but away from the hustle and bustle as is tucked away.

reviews.title: Excellent boutique hotel in the heart of Venice!
reviews.text: Wonderful attentive, friendly and knowledgable staff - really a home from home, like staying with friends with fantastic taste!

reviews.title: Compliments
reviews.text: The hotel map was better than any we had taken and the restaurant recommendations were great.

reviews.title: Very polite and professional service.
reviews.text: Will definitely be going back, if only for the home made cake!

reviews.title: Excellent value, excellent spot
reviews.text: We stayed at Ca' Del Nobile from 30 July to 2 August 2009. We were there to celebrate my birthday and also our friend's wedding which took place over the weekend.

reviews.title: You really feel a nobleman!!!
reviews.text: We stayed here for 2 nights, this place in the heart of Venice lagoon is the perfect place to discover the beauty of Venice. Walking distance from anything you can visit in Venice, in a small street where you can enjoy peace and silence. Rooms are big and well decorated, Breakfast is great with home made cakes and delicious croissants. The thing that gives a plus to this place is the owner, Nicola. He can give you suggestions about everything you need in Venice, his kindness will leave you speechless. Definetely the place to stay if you come to Venice. We'll surely come back.

reviews.title: Romantic city break
reviews.text: This charming boutique hotel is ideally located for getting around Venice, being only 2 minutes form St Mark's Square and 5 mins form the Rialto Bridge. Ignore bars and restaurants close to St Marks, and walk for a few minutes in any direction to find excellent places to eat and drink that are much better value and free of the tourist hordes. Don't bother with the Venice museum card unless you plan to spend every waking hour doing museums. Go for the Doge's Palace entry which also gets you into thew main museums. Check out the churches, many of which contain works of art by the great masters.

reviews.title: Great place to stay.
reviews.text: Me and my wife had the pleasure of staying at Ca Del Nobile during easter in Venice. It is, for venice, fairly priced, and comes with great service and friendliness, as well as complimentary minibar, cosy rooms, perfect location, free breakfast and internet. All in all great bang for the buck, that I gladly recommend anyone who can't afford Gritty Palace.

reviews.title: Perfect and practical location, delightful decor, welcoming, helpful and generous hosts, friendly boutique sized, attention to d
reviews.text: Perfect and practical location, delightful decor, welcoming, helpful and generous hosts, friendly boutique sized, attention to detail, would definitely recommend!

reviews.title: Excellent location, great hotel
reviews.text: Worth mentioning you get complimentary fruit and mini bar and afternoon hot drinks offered.

reviews.title: Lovely hotel, extremely friendly and very good location
reviews.text: We received a very friendly welcome from the moment we arrived at the hotel. It is a brilliant location very close to St Marks Square and easy to walk everywhere. The room was very comfortable and quiet and we had a lovely stay. The breakfasts were very good -lovely croissants with fruit filling as well as bread rolls and savory fillings. The hot chocolate I had was delicious and the homemade cakes were definitely worth having even at breakfast time! We would defaintely stay again.

reviews.title: A little jewel in an absolutely perfect location in the centre of Venice
reviews.text: Just got back from a 2 night stay at the Ca’ del Nobile with my wife. The hotel is a little jewel in an absolutely perfect location in the centre of Venice, just a few minutes away from St Mark Square and the Rialto Bridge, perfect location, very close to everything and yet very quiet and away from the crowd.

reviews.title: Welcoming, clean, convenient
reviews.text: We completely loved our stay at this hotel, the room was spacious and beautiful with a good sized bathroom and a great shower box. The staff went above and beyond to assist us, breakfast was delightful. The hotel also offers free wi-fi in the room and public areas.

reviews.title: A gem of an hotel
reviews.text: Overall, we were very happy with our choice and will definitely go back to Ca’ del Nobile next time we visit Venice.

reviews.title: A Real Find
reviews.text: 1 minute from St Marks Square, very quiet apart from the 7 am church bells but I guess that is an occupational hazard of Venice. Better described as a high class B&B or pension than a hotel, has only got 6 rooms.

reviews.title: Stay here in the centre of everything
reviews.text: Comfortable, very good location, clean and helpful staff. Perfect location if you come for the carnival or want to stay in heart of venice , less than 5 minutes walk to san marco. Staffs are very friendly helpful and very nice.

reviews.title: this is the best place to stay .. recreation, not just somewhere to sleep ... it's a special place thanks to its owner .
reviews.text: an individual approach is only the best hotels in the world ... I always was not clear why stay in hotels where you have been, it is always possible to visit a new place .. but here wants to go back there several times .. as well, and in itself Venice

reviews.title: Magnificent Hotel
reviews.text: places such as this hotel is unique, elegant атв still very nice hotel with beautiful rooms.. SUCH AS IN PICTURE .. so nice when the late evening, rainy evening, you meet and say that glad to see you, I recommend this place to everyone

reviews.title: Great all around
reviews.text: thank you for pleasant emotions

reviews.title: Excellent location & friendly staff, would highly recommend
reviews.text: This is an Excellent Hotel with a great quality of rooms, we have been in this hotel for few days and we were so happy that we have chosen the right hotel in Venice, the location is fantastic, it's one minute from San Marco Square and very close to Rialto Bridge as well, the Staff was very helpful and poliet, all in all we have had a great time there and when we come again to Venice we will definitely stay in this hotel.
